title: NBA Live 08 PC Roster Updates 2007-08 (V1.0)
description:
The latest PC patches and updates for NBA Live 08 PC!

Rosters are accurate as of 3/06/08.

Loadable files are:

07-08 Season uninjured players.
07-08 NLSC

Updates FINAL for the 2007-08 NBA season! ~

*ALL-STAR teams updated
*Rookies & Sophomores teams updated
*Missing player legends updated
*Player faces updated
*Player tattoos updated
*Up to date rosters with the season
*Player stats updated and accurate
*Team stats updated and accurate
*Players that can't be found in game updated
*Rookies added to teams
*& MORE

How to install and use the 2007-08 rosters:

Download
Unzip
Install
Run NBA Live 08
Load rosters
Play

Seeding after downloading appreciated.

You can trust this roster!
